Question: In the 2005 film 'No Entry', what was the speculation regarding its production in relation to the film 'Masti'?
Options:
A. It was expected to be a direct sequel to Masti.
B. It was rumored to be a remake of Masti.
C. It was confirmed to be a documentary about Masti.
D. It was planned as a crossover with Masti.
Answer: It was rumored to be a remake of Masti.
